summary: WHENEVER WINDSHIELD WIPERS ARE USED THEY WORK WHENEVER THEY WANT TOO.  SOMETIMES THEY RUN CONTINUALLY.  SOMETIMES THEY STOP ALL TOGETHER.  I USED TO HAVE A GMC SONOMA THAT DID THE EXACT SAME THING AND RECEIVED A RECALL. THIS PROBLEM WAS FIXED ON THE SONOMA.  THIS HAPPENS ANY TIME THE WIPERS ARE USED IN THE BLAZER.  I WOULD LIKE THIS FIXED IMMEDIATELY AT NO COST TO MYSELF.   *JB
